pp.h

00001 #ifndef _LANG_PP
00002 #define _LANG_PP
00003 
00004 
00005 /*
00006 * Idea of PLATFORM_xx definition is that there is single one defined / one platform.
00007 * - #include<lang/pp_once.h>
00008 *       Make sure no more than one platform is defined.
00009 * - #include<lang/pp_once_emu.h>
00010 *       Similar, but also defines EMULATOR_BUILD if build is for emulator (not target device)
00011 * - Uncomment #pragma message() lines for debugging (or replace with #warning if your preprocessor does not support the pragma)
00012 */
00013 
00014 // Setup
00015 #undef PLATFORM_DEFINED
00016 #undef EMULATOR_BUILD
00017 
00018 
00019 /*************************************************************
00020  * Platforms with emulators.
00021  *************************************************************/
00022  
00023 // PLATFORM_NGI
00024 #if !defined(PLATFORM_NGI) && defined(__NGI)
00025 //#pragma message("Defining PLATFORM_NGI")
00026 #define PLATFORM_NGI
00027 #include <lang/pp_once_emu.h>
00028 #endif
00029 
00030 // PLATFORM_S60_1X_2X
00031 #if !defined(PLATFORM_S60_1X_2X) && defined(__SYMBIAN32__) && !defined(__NGI) && !defined(__SERIES60_3X__)
00032 //#pragma message("Defining PLATFORM_S60_1X_2X")
00033 #define PLATFORM_S60_1X_2X
00034 #include <lang/pp_once_emu.h>
00035 #endif
00036 
00037 // PLATFORM_S60_3X
00038 #if !defined(PLATFORM_S60_3X) && defined(__SERIES60_3X__) && !defined(__NGI)
00039 //#pragma message("Defining PLATFORM_S60_3X")
00040 #define PLATFORM_S60_3X
00041 #include <lang/pp_once_emu.h>
00042 #endif
00043 
00044 // PLATFORM_BREW
00045 #if !defined(PLATFORM_BREW) && ( defined(AEE_SIMULATOR) || defined(DYNAMIC_APP))
00046 //#pragma message("Defining PLATFORM_BREW")
00047 #define PLATFORM_BREW
00048 #include <lang/pp_once_emu.h>
00049 #endif
00050 
00051 
00052 /*************************************************************
00053  * Platforms without emulators.
00054  *************************************************************/
00055 
00056 // PLATFORM_WINCE
00057 #if !defined(PLATFORM_WINCE) && defined(_WIN32_WCE)
00058 //#pragma message("Defining PLATFORM_WINCE")
00059 #define PLATFORM_WINCE
00060 #include <lang/pp_once.h>
00061 #endif
00062 
00063 // PLATFORM_PS2
00064 #if !defined(PLATFORM_PS2) && (defined(__ee__) && defined(__GCC__)) || defined(SN_TARGET_PS2)
00065 //#pragma message("Defining PLATFORM_PS2")
00066 #define PLATFORM_PS2
00067 #include <lang/pp_once.h>
00068 #endif
00069 
00070 // PLATFORM_WIN32
00071 #if !defined(PLATFORM_WIN32) && (defined(WIN32) || defined(_WIN32)) && !defined(_WIN32_WCE) && !defined(EMULATOR_BUILD)
00072 //#pragma message("Defining PLATFORM_WIN32")
00073 #define PLATFORM_WIN32
00074 #include <lang/pp_once.h>
00075 #endif
00076 
00077 
00078 /*************************************************************
00079  * Cleanup
00080  *************************************************************/
00081 
00082 // Check that a platform has been defined
00083 // NOTE: If you want to force building for a specific target using compiler options,
00084 // (e.g. gcc -DPLATFORM_WIN32) you also need to define PLATFORM_DEFINED to avoid this error.
00085 #ifndef PLATFORM_DEFINED
00086 #error No platform defined.
00087 #endif
00088 
00089 // Cleanup
00090 #undef PLATFORM_DEFINED
00091 
00092 
00093 /*************************************************************
00094  * Platform feature support
00095  *************************************************************/
00096 
00097 #ifndef PLATFORM_BREW
00098 #define PLATFORM_SUPPORTS_NAMESPACES
00099 #define PLATFORM_SUPPORTS_RTTI
00100 #endif
00101 
00102 #if defined(PLATFORM_WIN32) || defined(PLATFORM_NGI)
00103 #define PLATFORM_SUPPORTS_FINDFILE
00104 #endif
00105 
00106 #if defined(PLATFORM_S60_1X_2X) || defined(PLATFORM_S60_3X) || defined(PLATFORM_WINCE) || defined(PLATFORM_S60_3X) || defined(PLATFORM_BREW)
00107 #define LANG_NOEXCEPTIONS
00108 #else
00109 #define LANG_EXCEPTIONS
00110 #endif
00111 
00112 
00113 /*************************************************************
00114  * Namespace support
00115  *************************************************************/
00116 
00117 #ifdef PLATFORM_SUPPORTS_NAMESPACES
00118     #define BEGIN_NAMESPACE(X) namespace X {
00119     #define END_NAMESPACE() }
00120     #define USING_NAMESPACE(X) using namespace X;
00121     #define NS(X,Y) X::Y
00122 #else
00123     #define BEGIN_NAMESPACE(X)
00124     #define END_NAMESPACE()
00125     #define USING_NAMESPACE(X)
00126     #define NS(X,Y) Y
00127 #endif
00128 
00129 
00130 #endif // _LANG_PP
